UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Progressive Design of a Ranatuerin-2 Peptide from Amolops wuyiensis: Enhancement of Bioactivity and In Vivo Efficacy.
Literature.Author: Yao A, Liu T, Cai Y, Zhou S, Chen X, Zhou M, Ma C, Chen T, Shaw C, Wang L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=7 µM,Horse erythrocytes:95% Hemolysis=256 µM
